categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Molik was a male Human who served as a specialist in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Galactic War, he was stationed at Frostwake Outpost on the planet Hoth, where he distributed armor to other Imperial forces.
Molik appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Medium Armor Vendor for Imperial players on Hoth.
